themes.name: Studio Ghibli
themes.prompt: Transform this photo into Studio Ghibli anime style with soft watercolor backgrounds, whimsical characters, and magical atmosphere like Spirited Away or My Neighbor Totoro

themes.name: Simpsons
themes.prompt: Transform this photo into The Simpsons cartoon style with yellow skin, big eyes, overbite, and the iconic Springfield art style

themes.name: Rick and Morty
themes.prompt: Transform this photo into Rick and Morty animation style with exaggerated features, drooling mouths, unibrows, and sci-fi elements

themes.name: Dragon Ball Z
themes.prompt: Transform this photo into Dragon Ball Z anime style with spiky hair, intense expressions, power auras, and dynamic action poses

themes.name: Scooby Doo
themes.prompt: Transform this photo into Scooby Doo cartoon style with retro animation design and bright colors

themes.name: SpongeBob
themes.prompt: Transform this photo into SpongeBob SquarePants style with underwater Bikini Bottom setting, bright colors, and zany cartoon expressions

themes.name: South Park
themes.prompt: Transform this photo into South Park style with simple geometric shapes, cut-out animation look, beady eyes, and Colorado mountain town setting

themes.name: Pixar
themes.prompt: Transform this photo into Pixar animation style with vibrant colors, expressive cartoon features, and the distinctive 3D animated look of characters from Toy Story, Finding Nemo, and The Incredibles

themes.name: Flintstones
themes.prompt: Transform this photo into The Flintstones cartoon style with stone age setting, prehistoric elements, and classic Hanna-Barbera 60s animation design
